# Using imagery and visuals {#sec-using-imagery-and-visuals}

::: {.callout-important .unnumbered title="Summary" appearance="simple" icon="false"}
Users find images that are not informative annoying. They slow down page loading and increase scrolling and scanning time, especially on mobile devices.
:::

## Misconceptions about users and images {#sec-misconceptions-about-users-and-images}

## How to use images {#sec-how-to-use-images}

-   To impart information that cannot be easily expressed in words e.g. trends.

-   To create ambience.

-   They make scanning more difficult, especially on mobile devices.
